--mbx-drawer-text-color-light.description: Drawer text color when [dark](../../global/props.md#dark) mode is `off`

--mbx-drawer-text-color-dark.description: Drawer text color when [dark](../../global/props.md#dark) mode is `on`

--mbx-drawer-arrow-light.description: Drawer arrow color when [dark](../../global/props.md#dark) mode is `off`

--mbx-drawer-arrow-dark.description: Drawer arrow color when [dark](../../global/props.md#dark) mode is `on`

--mbx-drawer-arrow-hover-light.description: Drawer arrow color when [dark](../../global/props.md#dark) mode is `off`, on `hover

--mbx-drawer-arrow-hover-dark.description: Drawer arrow color when [dark](../../global/props.md#dark) mode is `on`, on `hover
